document_data.name: Corkaury Mindle
document_data.mainbody:
'''Corkaury Mindle''' was [[Taegan Nightwind]]'s accountant. He was married to [[Olpara Mindle]]. He was small even for a halfling, a wizened, hunched person, who nonetheless commanded the respect of everyone in the academy.{{cite book/The Rage||2}} After Taegan's academy burned down on the night of [[Ches 12]], {{yearlink|1373}}, he comforted the maestro and talked him out of several rash decisions.{{cite book/The Rage||12}} In [[Greengrass]] of the same year, Taegan and the [[faerie dragon]] [[Jivex]] were his guests briefly after a successful raid on the [[Cult of the Dragon]].{{cite book/The Rage||22}}
